import React from 'react'; import ReactDOM from 'react-dom'; const contentful = require('contentful'); import Slider from 'react-slick'; import '../index.css'; class Carousel extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { about: [], }; } componentDidMount() { const client = contentful.createClient({ // This is the space ID. A space is like a project folder in Contentful terms space: 'sqmp3jmwaedr', // This is the access token for this space. Normally you get both ID and the token in the Contentful web app accessToken: '01TsFxZR2mrw_VWsuCtzZCBCzKsrvCTDX9is-6UPzqU', }); // content type relates to the content type name in contentful // figured it outttt // 'post' instead of songList, post is linked to author so when post response you get author object as well client.getEntries({ content_type: 'about' }).then(response => { this.setState({ about: response.items, photoOne: response.items[0].fields.photos[0].fields.file.url, photoTwo: response.items[0].fields.photos[1].fields.file.url, photoThree: response.items[0].fields.photos[2].fields.file.url, photoFour: response.items[0].fields.photos[3].fields.file.url, }); }); } render() { var settings = { dots: true, autoplay: true, autoplaySpeed: 3000, }; return (

The entire experience was exceptional from the booking itself to the actual performance.

The song list is incredible, sooooo many options, everyone in attendance had a blast and it was the talk of the office for days afterward.

Amanda Power, Loopio

'Good Enough'; is a blatant misnomer - the band was excellent and all of my guests gushed compliments.

Best of all, the band was very encouraging and forgiving, which led to an incredible breadth of participation from people not expected to sing.

Malcolm White, celebrated 50th Birthday

We couldn't have asked for a better group of people.

The band learned two songs of our choosing for the big day and the father of the bride even got to sit on drums for a song.

All of our guests had a ton of fun and I cannot recommend Good Enough Live Karaoke enough!

Sean O'Grady

Thank you for you outstanding service and special thanks for an amazing, talented band.

I hope to work with you sometime in the future again!

Katerina Semenova, Premise LED

{/* */} {/* */}

With 120 people it is hard to keep everyone captivated during an event however, these guys did it!

Everyone had such a blast and it truly made our party something we will never forget.

Working with them was seamless and easy. I highly recommend having Good Enough Live Karaoke if you want your party to go from good to EPIC. Thanks

Sarah Rolland, Balzac's Coffee Roasters

I thought you were just fabulous!

And you made people SO happy. Really! World peace next!

Charlotte Mickie, President Mongrel International

); } } export default Carousel;
